chunk:
Brand: Dead Sea Collection

Category: Moisturizer

Ingredients: GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, PRUNUS AMIGDALUS DULCIS (SWEET ALMOND) FRUIT OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, MINERAL OIL (PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM), OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) FLOWER OIL, TRITICUM VULGARE (WHEAT) GERM OIL, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM).
book: 3012-Dead Sea Collection Body Oil, Lavender (2018 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
